appsgate.lig.manager.location.impl
Class PlaceManagerImpl

java.lang.Object
  appsgate.lig.manager.location.impl.PlaceManagerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
PlaceManagerSpec
public class PlaceManagerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements PlaceManagerSpec

This ApAM component is used to maintain location information for any object in the smart habitat.

Since:
February 26, 2013
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Cédric Gérard
